data.title: Springbank - 10 Year Old
data.meta_description: A 10 year old single malt whisky from the popular Campbeltown distillery, Springbank. Matured in a combination of bourbon and sherry casks, this complex expression expertly balances gentle peat smoke and maritime notes with exotic spice and fruit flavours and offers an excellent introduction to Springbank.  ** MAX 1 PE
